CBIC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 11 Tax Assistant and Havaldar Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 17:26 IST
 Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Custom
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 15,000 to 25,000




FOLLOW

The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 11 Tax Assistant and Havaldar Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the CBIC Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Assam.

CBIC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Tax Assistant 	01	Any Degree
Havaldar 	10	10th Pass

Age Limit for the CBIC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 27 years.

Selection Process for the CBIC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CBIC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 15,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the CBIC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the CBIC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Tax Assistant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	23-08-2025
Last Date of Application	13-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
